caption.p: The Chinese patent medicines containing FCB.

tr.td: Ermu Ningsou Wan

Relieving convulsion, calming wind, dissolving phlegm, and restoring a clear head

fn.p: Note. “Dispelling wind” is a therapeutic principle and method of traditional Chinese medicine for cough, rhinitis, and convulsion; “Tonifying yin” and “moistening lung” are the ways to promote the production of body fluid which could prevent the lung from being damaged by harmful substances from outside; Tonifying Qi and Yang is a therapeutic method of traditional Chinese medicine to improve the body's immunity.
